Text: challenge for you blackcanary! can you find x-factor annual #4 (1989)? it's not very hard to find a scan in old "atlantis attacks" or "x-factor" torrents BUT all files i've found have been one of those partial scans -- either only the main crossover story or just one backup story -- and i want the whole issue or a c2c. please if you can.

I have a request, that could, I suppose, also be a challenge. I was wondering if you had any of the early 90s Malibu series? Specifically, I am talking about Protectors, Arrow, Airman, Man of War, Dinosaurs for Hire, Gravestone, Genesis, and ExMutants. In other words Malibu that was NOT ultraverse and NOT Bravura. These are impossible to find online, but if you think you can...

Hi BlackCanary I also have a request (if it's possible), could you post the "Freedom Fighters (1976-1987)" because the torrent here is fallen from a long time ago :(

Thanks!

comixscholar, I was able to find several of the comics you were looking for:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7990157/Dinosaurs_for_Hire_v1__1-9___Fall_Classic_(1988-1990)_[Eternity]

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7990168/Dinosaurs_for_Hire_v2__1-12_(1993-1994)_[Malibu]_(Requested)

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7991202/Ex-Mutants_1-18___Microseries_Erin_(1992)_[Malibu]_(Requested)

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7991234/Protectors__1-20___Handbook_(1992-1994)_(Requested)

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7991302/Genesis__0_(1993)_[Malibu_Comics]_(Requested)

I'll keep my eyes out for Airman, Arrow, Gravestone, and Man of War.
